DGACM.relevance_comment: Directs the Secretary‑General to draw up the provisional agenda for each session of the Economic and Social Council and to submit it to the Council. The Department for General Assembly and Conference Management (DGACM) provides procedural and technical secretariat support to the Economic and Social Council (see PPB 2.1) and would be the operational service responsible for preparing/drafting and processing those provisional agendas on behalf of the Secretary‑General.

Specifies that the provisional agenda for the organizational session must be submitted at least three weeks in advance. This is a timing obligation placed on the Secretary‑General that DGACM, as the secretariat service for ECOSOC, would implement by preparing and ensuring timely submission of the agenda.

Specifies that the provisional agenda for the substantive session is to be submitted at the organizational session. This places a procedural obligation on the Secretary‑General that DGACM would operationalize when compiling and presenting the substantive session agenda as part of its secretariat functions for ECOSOC.

Provides that the agenda for the organizational session shall include consideration of the provisional agenda for the substantive session. Although framed as an agenda-content requirement for the Council, this is part of the same rule governing agenda preparation and thus translates into an action DGACM must ensure when drafting and organizing the organizational session agenda on behalf of the Secretary‑General.
